thread.title: “Eater” calls NYC ‘Barbecue Capital’, gets roasted by Twitter (19 Photos)
thread.title_full: “Eater” calls NYC ‘Barbecue Capital’, gets roasted by Twitter (19 Photos)

author: Dustin
title: “Eater” calls NYC ‘Barbecue Capital’, gets roasted by Twitter (19 Photos)
text:
Ernesto Andrade/Flickr 
Pseudo food critic Nick Solares recently penned an exclusive feature HERE about Bill Durney’s NYC BBQ joint, Hometown Bar-B-Que. In an otherwise harmless and mouthwatering review, Solares makes the near fatal mistake of claiming New York City to be the new capital of BBQ. Now, I don’t know where you’re from, but here in Texas, thems’ fightin’ words! Twitter got wind of the story and properly smoked Solares. 2
